name: Ritual For Coakkan
description:
Ritual For Coakkan is a lo-fi short trip down a river in the jungle haze.

-----------------------------------

The body of our brother lies in the boat. Charms and psalms are being used to keep feared spirits away. The village elders have chosen the one to accomplish the ritual. The passage is ahead in the impenetrable mist.

- 10 minutes game
- Cool unrealistic canoe controls
- Soothing gameplay
- Environmental narrative


Controls on start screen. Escape to quit the program.
